rules.name: Monen Schilderwerken Website
rules.description: You are building a sleek, responsive, single-page business website for a Dutch painter using Flask and NGINX. Keep the structure modular and clean.

items: **Black and White Color Scheme**: Use only black, white, and grayscale values for layout and typography.
**Clean Typography**: Use sans-serif fonts (like Inter or Helvetica). Keep text legible and minimal.
**Large Hero Image**: Use a full-width image of Jelle on the homepage, above the fold.
**Simple Grid Layout**: Use a two or three-column layout for services if needed, but default to vertical stacks on mobile.
**Responsive Design**: Site must be fully responsive and mobile-optimized.
**Instagram Integration**: Add a clear button or icon that links to Instagram. Open in a new tab.
**WhatsApp Button**: Add a floating WhatsApp contact button that links to `https://wa.me/31647323264`.
**Image Sources**: Pull static images from Google Drive (manual selection) and embed Instagram preview images with caching.
**No Login or User Auth**: This is a static business website. Do not implement login, sessions, or auth flows.
**Single Blueprint**: Use a `main` blueprint for all routes.
**Template Inheritance**: Use Jinja2 inheritance for `base.html`, `home.html`, and partials like `header.html`, `footer.html`.
**Static Files**: Organize static files under `static/` (e.g., `css/`, `js/`, `img/`).
**App Factory Pattern**: Use the Flask app factory pattern for modularity.
**Minimal Python Logic**: Backend should just serve templates and static content — no business logic or database models.
**Use Tailwind CSS**: For fast and responsive styling. Configure in `static/css/` if not using CDN.
**No Heavy JS Frameworks**: Avoid React, Vue, or complex frontends. Alpine.js or plain JS is okay for interactions.
**SEO Best Practices**: Include title, description, OpenGraph tags, and alt text for images.
**Accessibility**: Use semantic HTML and ARIA tags for accessibility.
**WSGI Server**: Use Gunicorn to serve Flask app.
**Static Caching**: Configure NGINX to serve static files and cache them aggressively.
**Security Headers**: Enable basic security headers (Content Security Policy, X-Frame-Options, etc.).
**HTTPS Redirect**: Ensure all HTTP traffic is redirected to HTTPS.
**Directory Structure**: Use folders like `templates/`, `static/css/`, `static/img/`, `main/`, and `app.py` at root.
**Naming Conventions**: Use `snake_case` for file and folder names (e.g., `about_section.html`, `services.py`).
**Image Optimization**: Compress all uploaded images and serve appropriately sized versions for different screen sizes.
**About Section**: Highlight Jelle’s 7+ years experience and Dutch craftsmanship tone.
**Services**: Clearly list interior painting, exterior painting, and wood rot repair — exclude latex painting.
**Contact Info**: Clearly display phone, email, and WhatsApp button. Avoid using contact forms.
